sentences.en: At the end of the meal Burgoyne was asked to propose a toast.
sentences.cn: 用餐终了，伯戈因被邀请致祝酒词。

sentences.en: Did he propose marriage to you?
sentences.cn: 他向你求婚了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He proposed to his girlfriend over a public-address system.
sentences.cn: 他在有线广播系统上向女友求婚。

sentences.en: I propose him as a candidate for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 我提名他为总统候选人.

sentences.en: I propose resting for an hour.
sentences.cn: 我建议休息一小时.

sentences.en: I propose that he should leave now.
sentences.cn: 我建议他现在就走.

sentences.en: I propose to set off immediately.
sentences.cn: 我建议马上动身.

sentences.en: I would like to propose a vote of thanks to our host.
sentences.cn: 我提议对我们的主人表示感谢。

sentences.en: I'd like to propose a motion, Mr. Speaker.
sentences.cn: 议长先生, 我想提出一项动议.

sentences.en: It was a hard decision for them to propose the package solution.
sentences.cn: 他们下很大决心,提出了“一揽子解决”的设想.

sentences.en: Lavalais raised his glass to propose a toast to the newlyweds.
sentences.cn: 拉瓦雷举起酒杯，提议为新婚夫妇干杯。

sentences.en: Please propose amendments and addenda to the first draft of the document.
sentences.cn: 请对这个文件的初稿提出修改和补充意见.

sentences.en: Shaun proposed to me only six months after we met.
sentences.cn: 我们相识仅六个月，肖恩就向我求婚了。

sentences.en: So I propose a peace, a truce.
sentences.cn: 因此,我提出讲和, 提出休战.

sentences.en: the changes currently proposed by the local planning authorities
sentences.cn: 目前由地方规划局提议的改革

sentences.en: the Lord Mayor &B{proposed a toast to} the Queen.
sentences.cn: 市长大人提议为女王干杯。

sentences.en: the proposed budget cuts
sentences.cn: 所提出的预算削减

sentences.en: The resolution was proposed by the chairman of the International Committee.
sentences.cn: 那项决议是由国际委员会主席提出的。

sentences.en: We propose an early start tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们打算明天早早出发。

sentences.en: We propose to furnish our own house according to our own taste.
sentences.cn: 我们建议按自己的爱好布置自己的房子.

sentences.en: With your permission, I'll propose a toast.
sentences.cn: 请充许我祝酒.

words.tran_cn: 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者
提议；计划（propose的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.phrase: propose a toast (或 propose someone's health)
phrases.tran_cn: 提议（为某人健康和幸福）干杯
推荐某人(参加某组织)；提名某人(任某职)

trans.tran_en: to suggest something as a plan or course of action
to ask someone to marry you, especially in a formal way

trans.tran_cn: 提议， 建议；提名， 推荐
trans.tran_en: to suggest something as a plan or course of action
